description: Behaviors for creating interactive switches, buttons, and trigger mechanisms

switch.name: Switch
switch.description: A versatile switch object that can be toggled on and off by the player. Features customizable text prompts, level requirements, and multiple activation types.

properties.name: SWITCHEDON
properties.description: Initial state of the switch

properties.name: ONTEXT
properties.description: Text displayed when switch is off and can be turned on

properties.name: OFFTEXT
properties.description: Text displayed when switch is on and can be turned off

properties.name: USERANGE
properties.description: Distance at which the switch can be used

properties.name: PLAYERLEVEL
properties.description: Minimum player level required to use the switch

properties.name: SWITCHTYPE
properties.description: Whether the switch can be used multiple times

properties.name: NPC_TRIGGER
properties.description: Whether NPCs can trigger the switch

properties.name: ITEM_HIGHLIGHT
properties.description: Highlight type for the switch object

properties.name: PROMPT_DISPLAY
properties.description: Where to display the prompt text

properties.name: ON_ANIMATION
properties.description: Animation set for ON state (0 = AnimSetList)

properties.name: OFF_ANIMATION
properties.description: Animation set for OFF state (0 = AnimSetList)

teleswitch.name: TeleSwitch
teleswitch.description: A switch that teleports the player to a linked object when activated. Features level requirements, customizable exit angles, and visual highlighting. Perfect for creating teleportation systems and fast travel points.

properties.name: PROMPT_TEXT
properties.description: Text displayed in the interaction prompt

properties.name: USE_RANGE
properties.description: Distance at which the player can interact with the switch

properties.name: PlayerLevel
properties.description: Minimum player level required to use this switch

properties.name: TELEPORT_EXIT_ANGLE
properties.description: Player's exit angle upon teleportation

properties.name: ITEM_HIGHLIGHT
properties.description: Visual highlighting method for the teleport target

steps: Configure interaction range and prompt text
Set player level requirement if needed
Set up visual highlighting for target
Link to target object using entity string

variable_switch.name: Variable Switch
variable_switch.description: A variable control switch that allows players to increase or decrease a value using + and - keys. Features customizable ranges, global variable storage, and real-time value display. Perfect for creating adjustable settings, volume controls, and variable-based game mechanics.

properties.name: PROMPT_TEXT
properties.description: Text displayed in the interaction prompt

properties.name: PROMPT_DISPLAY
properties.description: Where to display the prompt text

properties.name: USE_RANGE
properties.description: Distance at which the player can interact with the switch

properties.name: STARTER_VALUE
properties.description: Base starting value for the variable

properties.name: MINIMUM_VALUE
properties.description: Minimum value the variable can reach

properties.name: MAXIMUM_VALUE
properties.description: Maximum value the variable can reach

properties.name: VARIABLE_SWITCH_USER_GLOBAL
properties.description: Unique user global variable name for storing the switch value

properties.name: ITEM_HIGHLIGHT
properties.description: Visual highlighting method for the switch object

steps: Configure interaction range and prompt text
Set up value ranges (minimum, maximum, starter)
Configure global variable name for storage
Set up visual highlighting if needed
Verify value changes and global storage

winswitch.name: Win Switch
winswitch.description: A switch that ends the current level when activated by the player. Features customizable prompts, level transition control, and state reset options. Perfect for creating level completion triggers and game progression points.

properties.name: PROMPT_TEXT
properties.description: Text displayed in the interaction prompt

properties.name: USE_RANGE
properties.description: Distance at which the player can interact with the switch

properties.name: ITEM_HIGHLIGHT
properties.description: Visual highlighting method for the switch object

properties.name: GoToLevelMode
properties.description: How to handle level transitions (Use Storyboard Logic = next level in storyboard, Go to Specific Level = specific level)

properties.name: ResetStates
properties.description: Whether to reset states when entering the new level

steps: Configure interaction range and prompt text
Set up visual highlighting if needed

code_switch.name: Code Switch
code_switch.description: A secure code entry switch that requires a specific 3-digit code to activate. Features interactive keypad interface, customizable messages, alarm system, and visual feedback. Perfect for creating secure access points, puzzle elements, and locked areas.

properties.name: PROMPT_TEXT
properties.description: Text displayed in the interaction prompt

properties.name: USE_RANGE
properties.description: Distance at which the player can interact with the switch

properties.name: SWITCH_CODE
properties.description: 3-digit code required to unlock the switch

properties.name: READOUT_X
properties.description: X position of the code display on screen

properties.name: READOUT_Y
properties.description: Y position of the code display on screen

properties.name: USEAGE_TEXT
properties.default: Q-Select, Z-Change or enter Numbers, X-Submit
properties.description: Instructions displayed during code entry

properties.name: INCORRECT_TEXT
properties.description: Message displayed when wrong code is entered

properties.name: CORRECT_TEXT
properties.description: Message displayed when correct code is entered

properties.name: STATUS
properties.description: Initial state of the code switch

properties.name: FAIL_ALARM
properties.description: Alarm system for failed attempts

properties.name: ALARM_RANGE
properties.description: Range for alarm sound to attract AI

steps: Configure interaction range and prompt text
Set up alarm system if needed

kill_switch.name: Kill Switch
kill_switch.description: A mission-based switch that activates when all enemies in a specified area are eliminated. Features enemy counting, customizable messages, global variable integration, and automatic cleanup. Perfect for creating elimination missions, area clear objectives, and dynamic combat scenarios.

properties.name: EVENT_TEXT
properties.description: Text displayed when the event starts

properties.name: ENEMY_RANGE
properties.description: Range to detect enemies around the switch

properties.name: ENEMY_COUNTER
properties.description: Whether to display enemy count during the event

properties.name: COUNTER_TEXT
properties.description: Text displayed with enemy count

properties.name: END_TEXT
properties.description: Text displayed when all enemies are killed

properties.name: END_TEXT_DURATION
properties.description: Duration in seconds to display the end message

properties.name: HIDE_OBJECT
properties.description: Whether to hide/destroy the switch object after completion

properties.name: USER_GLOBAL_AFFECTED
properties.description: Name of user global variable to increment (e.g., 'MyMoney')

properties.name: GLOBAL_AFFECTED_VALUE
properties.description: Amount to increment the user global variable

steps: Set up event and counter text
Set up global variable integration if needed

switch_combo.name: Switch Combo
switch_combo.description: A combo-value switch that contributes to a global counter system. Multiple switches can work together to reach a target value of 100, triggering activation when the total is reached. Features deferred logic connections, customizable switch values, and level requirements. Perfect for creating multi-switch puzzles and cooperative activation systems.

properties.name: UseRange
properties.description: Distance at which the player can interact with the switch

properties.name: SwitchedOn
properties.description: Initial state of the switch

properties.name: OnText
properties.description: Text displayed when switch is off and can be turned on

properties.name: OffText
properties.description: Text displayed when switch is on and can be turned off

properties.name: PlayerLevel
properties.description: Minimum player level required to use the switch

properties.name: SwitchType
properties.description: Whether the switch can be used multiple times

properties.name: SwitchValue
properties.description: Value this switch contributes to the global combo counter

properties.name: DeferLinks
properties.description: Whether to defer logic connections until combo value is reached

properties.name: DeferLinksValue
properties.description: Value at which deferred logic connections are triggered

properties.name: ITEM_HIGHLIGHT
properties.description: Visual highlighting method for the switch object

steps: Set AlwaysActive to ON for each switch
Attach the switch_combo behavior to each
Configure interaction range and text prompts
Set individual switch values (total should reach 100)
Configure deferred logic settings if needed
Set up level requirements if needed

switch_count.name: Switch Count
switch_count.description: A counting switch that tracks how many switches have been activated in a series. When all required switches are activated, it triggers completion actions like level ending or object activation. Features progress display, customizable completion actions, and visual feedback. Perfect for creating sequential switch puzzles and multi-step activation systems.

properties.name: SWITCHES
properties.description: Total number of switches that need to be activated

properties.name: SWITCH_STATE
properties.description: Initial state of the switch

properties.name: USE_RANGE
properties.description: Distance at which the player can interact with the switch

properties.name: USE_PROMPT
properties.description: Text displayed in the interaction prompt

properties.name: MESSAGE_DURATION
properties.description: Duration in seconds to display progress messages

properties.name: COMPLETION
properties.description: Action to perform when all switches are activated

properties.name: ITEM_HIGHLIGHT
properties.description: Visual highlighting method for the switch object

steps: Set AlwaysActive to ON for each switch
Attach the switch_count behavior to each
Configure total number of switches required
Set up interaction range and prompt text
Configure message duration for progress display
Set completion action (End Level or Activate if Used)
Check completion triggers when all switches are activated
Test level transitions or object activation

switch_sequence.name: Switch Sequence
switch_sequence.description: A sequence-based switch that must be activated in the correct order. Switches reset after a timeout if the sequence is not completed, requiring players to activate them in the proper sequence. Features automatic reset timing, order validation, and completion triggers. Perfect for creating memory puzzles and sequential activation challenges.

properties.name: TOTAL_SWITCHES
properties.description: Total number of switches in the sequence group

properties.name: SWITCH_NUMBER
properties.description: Position of this switch in the sequence (1st, 2nd, 3rd, etc.)

properties.name: SWITCH_RESET
properties.description: Seconds before switches reset if sequence is not completed

properties.name: USE_RANGE
properties.description: Distance at which the player can interact with the switch

properties.name: USE_PROMPT
properties.description: Text displayed in the interaction prompt

properties.name: ITEM_HIGHLIGHT
properties.description: Visual highlighting method for the switch object

steps: Set AlwaysActive to ON for each switch
Attach the switch_sequence behavior to each
Configure total number of switches in sequence
Configure reset timing for failed attempts
Set up interaction range and prompt text
Check completion triggers when sequence is correct
Test object activation on successful completion

switch_timed.name: Switch Timed
switch_timed.description: A timed switch that automatically resets after a specified delay. Features configurable reset timing, customizable prompts, and visual feedback. Perfect for creating temporary activations, timed doors, and temporary power sources that require periodic reactivation.

properties.name: USE_RANGE
properties.description: Distance at which the player can interact with the switch

properties.name: USE_PROMPT
properties.description: Text displayed in the interaction prompt

properties.name: PROMPT_DISPLAY
properties.description: Where to display the prompt text

properties.name: RESET_DELAY
properties.description: Seconds before the switch automatically resets to off

properties.name: ITEM_HIGHLIGHT
properties.description: Visual highlighting method for the switch object

steps: Configure interaction range and prompt text

weight_switch.name: Weight Switch
weight_switch.description: A physics-based switch that activates when sufficient weight is placed on it. Features configurable weight requirements, player weight contribution, visual movement, and global variable integration. Perfect for creating pressure plates, weight-based puzzles, and physics-driven activation systems.

properties.name: PROMPT_TEXT
properties.description: Text displayed when weight requirement is not met

properties.name: ACTIVATION_TEXT
properties.description: Text displayed when switch is successfully activated

properties.name: ACTIVATION_WEIGHT
properties.description: Total weight required to activate the switch

properties.name: PLAYER_WEIGHT
properties.description: Weight contribution from the player standing on the switch

properties.name: MOVEMENT
properties.description: Amount of vertical movement when switch is activated

properties.name: RESET_SWITCH
properties.description: Whether to reset the switch after activation

properties.name: USER_GLOBAL_AFFECTED
properties.description: Name of user global variable to affect with weight value

properties.name: PROCESS_AFFECT
properties.description: Whether to add or deduct weight from the global variable

steps: Configure weight requirements and player contribution
Set up movement amount and reset options
Configure global variable integration if needed
Test object stacking and weight accumulation
